alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Loup; Rock; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Rock, northeastern Loup, northwestern Garfield, southwestern Holt and northwestern Wheeler Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of Newport to 13 miles northeast of Rose to 13 miles north of Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atkinson, Chambers, Amelia, Rose, Emmet, Fox Bayou, Duff, Sunfish Lake, Pony Lake, Sybrant, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area and Carson Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 140 and 169. Highway 20 between mile markers 287 and 299. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
